Route Summary:
This is a 54 miler which takes a few of the rides I have done and changes up the roads a bit.  A few roads in west concord on this route will be new to me (but all green approved roads based on Rubel bike map).

Starting in Concord we head out to Harvard MA via Concord, Acton, Littleton, Harvard and back thru Lincoln.

The route
http://tinyurl.com/8blspqz

Riders should plan to meet at 8:45 am and be ready to ride around 9:00am

We should return to the parking area around 2:30 pm if we can keep the 12 to 15 pace. Please be able to b/c the group needs to return on time to the parking area.


Starting point

Water fountain on bike path @
Depot Square, Downtown Lexington, MA

All day type Parking Lot right at depot

Stopping point

Harvard General Store
1 Still River Road
Harvard, MA 01451
(978) 430-0062
harvardgeneralstore.com

What's required
------------------------------------
Bike helmets and road bikes / skinny tire hybrids in good repair
minimum 2-3 full water bottles (cold!).
bring snacks


What's recommended:
------------------------------------
Spare tire, repair kit, sun screen, snacks, energy bars, rain gear, an extra layer, a bike lock, and a cell phone.


"Cue"gle sheet

 http://files.meetup.com/482869/LexingtonToHarvard54.txt
